com.github.robtimus.obfuscation.json

Interface JSONObfuscator.LimitConfigurer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JSONObfuscator.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    JSONObfuscator

    public static interface JSONObfuscator.LimitConfigurer
extends JSONObfuscator.Builder
    An object that can be used to configure handling when the obfuscated result exceeds a pre-defined limit.
    Since:
    1.2
    Author:
    Rob Spoor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JSONObfuscator.LimitConfigurer withTruncatedIndicator(String pattern)
      Sets the indicator to use when the obfuscated result is truncated due to the limit being exceeded.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.robtimus.obfuscation.json.JSONObfuscator.Builder

        allByDefault, build, caseInsensitiveByDefault, caseSensitiveByDefault, excludeArraysByDefault, excludeObjectsByDefault, includeArraysByDefault, includeObjectsByDefault, limitTo, produceValidJSON, scalarsOnlyByDefault, transform, withMalformedJSONWarning, withPrettyPrinting, withProperty, withProperty

    • Method Detail

      • withTruncatedIndicator

        JSONObfuscator.LimitConfigurer withTruncatedIndicator(String pattern)
        Sets the indicator to use when the obfuscated result is truncated due to the limit being exceeded. There can be one place holder for the total number of characters. Defaults to ... (total: %d). Use null to omit the indicator.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern to use as indicator.
        Returns:
        An object that can be used to configure the handling when the obfuscated result exceeds a pre-defined limit, or continue building JSONObfuscators.
